entry.title: New release for Ticky: v1.7.0
entry.content:
Hello,

In this release, I have finally resolved the issues with multi-platform builds, so those should be functional now. Additionally, repeating cards have been finally added, currently in its beta stage, so don't depend on them fully just yet. No issues throughout my testing, but it would be nice to get it verified by a lot more people.

Additionally, please consider joining our Discord server if you want to participate in deciding where Ticky should go!

What's Changed

  • fix: Multi-platform builds by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/59
  • feat: Repeating cards by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/60

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/compare/v1.6.0...v1.7.0

entry.title: New release for Ticky: v1.8.0
entry.content:
Hey everyone, welcome to another release!

Let's jump right in, this release contains these changes: - You can disable sign-ups for users even while keeping SMTP enabled, thanks @swinis for the suggestion. To use it, include DISABLE_USER_SIGNUPS=true in your environment variables. Example can be seen in the README compose file. - Ability to Import existing Boards from Trello - focused on keeping as much information as possible, including possibility to map Ticky users to Trello users to keep assignees and card owners (keep in mind large boards may experience performance issues in the board view and I would recommend disabling animations in the board settings - further improvements are on the roadmap, just slightly more complicated). Available in the Board creation modal.

  • Overhauled board settings to improve performance in large boards.
  • Added titles to all pages. No more uninformative "Ticky" in the title bar! ðŸ˜„

  • Added board settings tab for exporting your board - for now only meant for sharing whenever there's an issue, in the future will be added ability to import them to a different instance.

  • Other fixes and improvements.

Nowadays I am quite busy, but I try my best to keep features coming out at a stable pace and all that while prioritizing bug fixes. So if you have any suggestions/issues you come across, please let me know, I address all of them :)

Thanks for using Ticky!

What's Changed

  • feat: Option to disable sign-ups and fixed logic for SMTP disabling by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/64
  • refactor: Time select common component by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/66
  • fix: Exception when data protection key stored is incorrect by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/71
  • feat: Import board from Trello by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/70
  • style: Disable option to highlight settings menu tabs by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/72
  • perf: Significantly improved performance in board settings with large amount of cards by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/73
  • feat: Export board for debug purposes by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/74
  • style: Improved design of multiline column names by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/75
  • feat: Added browser tab titles to all pages by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/76

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/compare/v1.7.1...v1.8.0

entry.title: New release for Ticky: v1.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Option to set start date for repeat cards, meaning when next date should be calculated from by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/78
  • fix: Month days repeat being unrecognized by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/79
  • fix: Text of modal button from Done to Submit by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/83
  • feat: Used concurrency group for unstable release to cancel previous runs with many PRs by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/81
  • style: Remove shadow under card in light mode when sorting cards by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/82
  • fix: When an index issue occurs, recover gracefully and don't silence exception by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/84
  • fix: Added unit tests for repeat calculation, resolved issue with wrong calculations by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/85
  • feat: Display all linked cards, not just one per group by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/86

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/compare/v1.8.0...v1.8.1
